'''Web Events''' are [[Events]] that are accessed outside of the game.

Web events can take various forms, including events found on the official website, [[Fanart Event|fanart events]], [[Social Media Event|social media events]], [[Submission Event|submission events]], and [[:Category:Live Events|live events]]. Certain types of events, such as [[Login Event|login events]] and [[Mail Events|mail events]], can be either web events or [[In-Game Event|in-game events]].

Many web events can be accessed via selecting {{Icon|Special Event}} '''Special Event''' from the [[Paimon Menu]].
